channel.title: sslocal on mannuan
channel.description: Recent content in sslocal on mannuan

item.title: shadowsocks的sslocal的使用
item.description: 安装python-shadowsocks pip install shadowsocks 配置文件(config.json) { "server":"ip", "server_port":"port", "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "password":"password", "timeout":300, "method":"aes-256-cfb", "fast_open": false, "workers": 1 } 运行 sslocal -c /etc/shadowsocks/config.json 启动报错 undefined symbol EVP_CIPHER_CTX_cleanup 打开openssl.py文件 vim python路径/dist-packages/shadowsocks/crypto/openssl.py 修改 把文件中的cleanup改为reset
